item.description:
It's summer and it's been really hot and wet. This month's meetup is at the Same time, same place. Sure hope to see you all there. Meeting fee is optional. This time food will be a lovely salad, watermelon, bread sticks and cool drinks. etc.

It'll be great to see you all.

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, the company is friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs July Meetup
